Class StudentService

java.lang.Object
spss.project.backend.user.student.StudentService
@Service public class StudentService extends Object
A service for working with students.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public Student save(String email, String firstName, String lastName, LocalDate dateOfBirth, int balance) throws org.springframework.dao.DuplicateKeyException, Exception
      Saves a student to the database.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the student
      firstName - the first name of the student
      lastName - the last name of the student
      dateOfBirth - the date of birth of the student
      balance - the balance of the student
      Returns:
      the saved student
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while saving the student
      org.springframework.dao.DuplicateKeyException

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent(String id) throws Exception
      Deletes a student from the database by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the student to delete
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while deleting the student

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent(String id) throws Exception
      Finds a student by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the student to find
      Returns:
      the student with the given id, or null if no such student exists
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while retrieving the student

    • getStudentByEmail

      public Student getStudentByEmail(String email) throws Exception
      Finds a student by its email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the student to find
      Returns:
      the student with the given email, or null if no such student exists
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while retrieving the student

    • updateStudent

      public Student updateStudent(String id, String firstName, String lastName, LocalDate dateOfBirth) throws org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException, Exception
      Updates a student in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the student to update
      firstName - the new first name of the student
      lastName - the new last name of the student
      dateOfBirth - the new date of birth of the student
      Returns:
      the updated student
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException - if the student with the given id does not exist
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the student

    • addBalance

      public void addBalance(String id, int amount) throws org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException, Exception
      Adds the given amount to the balance of the student with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the student
      amount - the amount to add to the balance of the student
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException - if the student with the given id does not exist
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the student
